workflows.title: toxindex-rap
workflows.label: ToxIndex RAP
workflows.description: Retrieval-augmented agent for evidence-backed chemical toxicity assessment.

workflows.title: toxindex-vanilla
workflows.label: ToxIndex Vanilla
workflows.description: Direct OpenAI LLM answer (no schema, no retrieval).

workflows.title: toxindex-json
workflows.label: ToxIndex JSON
workflows.description: OpenAI LLM answer formatted as JSON schema.

workflows.title: toxindex-heatmap
workflows.label: heatmap
workflows.description: Combines insights from prediction, metabolism and pathway analysis to provide a comprehensive toxicological assessment of chemical compounds.
workflows.initial_prompt: what chemical are you interested in?

workflows.title: toxindex-pathway
workflows.label: Pathway Analysis
workflows.description: Analyze and visualize pathway data using WikiPathways and Cytoscape integration.
workflows.initial_prompt: Enter pathway ID (e.g., WP3657) or upload data file

workflows.title: toxindex-smiles
workflows.label: SMILES Extraction
workflows.initial_prompt: Upload a file containing chemical structures.

workflows.title: toxindex-ranking
workflows.label: Hazard Ranking
workflows.description: Workflow that ranks chemicals based on user-specified endpoints
workflows.initial_prompt: Upload a text file of of InChI's and an endpoint to be ranked by
